Header: Bond placed for UPFA candidate President Rajapaksa (Watch Report)
Content: The bond for UPFA Presidential Candidate, President Mahinda Rajapaksa, was deposited on Monday. The bond was deposited on behalf of President Mahinda Rajapaksa, by UPFA General Secretary Minister Susil Premajayantha, at the Elections Secretariat. SLFP National Organiser Minister Basil Rajapaksa, General Secretary Minister Anura Priyadarshana Yapa and Leader of the Mahajana Eksath Peramuna, Minister Dinesh Gunawardena, were also present at the occasion. Minister Susil Premajayantha commenting on the preparations ahead of the presidential poll noted that they have already begun to establish steering committees for polling booths, electorates as well as districts. Minister Dinesh Gunawardene commented that 14 political parties have joined hands with the SLFP to secure the victory of President Mahinda Rajapaksa. Minister Anura Yapa echoed the same views and stated that all constituent parties of the UPFA would work together for this purpose.
